========================
Logging Config
========================
.. currentmodule:: src.logging_config

Overview
--------
This module provides centralized logging configuration for the DIP_SMC_PSO project. It sets up consistent logging formats, handlers, and levels across all modules to facilitate debugging and monitoring of simulations and control operations.

Examples
--------
.. doctest::

   >>> from src.logging_config import setup_logging
   >>> # Configure logging with default settings
   >>> setup_logging()
